data.title: Zeray Country Bahçecik
data.text:
Buruj Real Estate presents to you the (Form Anatolia) project in Izmit-Kogli, which is one of the most important industrial and tourist centers in the Marmara region

The location of the project is very special, as it is located near the most important tourist areas in Turkey. The project has given the project a great tourist value,

It is located on Sapanca Road, close to the sea, and is 11 km from Masukiye , which is considered one of the most beautiful tourist areas in Turkey.

And 22 km from Kartepe, which is one of the most famous ski areas in Turkey

The project is one of the most important investment opportunities in Turkey because it is located in the city of Kocaeli, which is the pulse of the Turkish economy.

The project area is characterized by vitality, and provides all the requirements that its residents need, as it is a few minutes away from the shopping centers that include the most luxurious international brands, and you can reach the malls in the area on foot..

The land is located in the city of Balik Asir in the Savaştepe region

The land is made of two parts

• The first part with an area: 777 square meters

• The second part with an area: 778 square meters

• Total: 1555 square meters

Two huts can be built on each part

The state of Balikesir is located in northwestern Turkey, with its coasts extending to the Sea of ​​Marmara and the Aegean Sea.

Balikesir is adjacent to the provinces of Çanakkale, Izmir, Manisa, Kütahya and Bursa.

Balikesir includes several small towns of great natural beauty.

Balikesir attracts tourists with its beaches stretching on the coasts of the Aegean and Marmara seas, the stunning dark blue waters, and the rich greenery that gently covers the land, enabling tourists to spend a wonderful time amidst the wonderful scenery.

The economy of Palik captive is mostly based on agriculture.

The location and climate of Balikesir allow the production of all types of agricultural products in the state.

Cereal products, tobacco, sugar beet, cotton and tomatoes are the most productive agricultural products.

Thanks to the development of agriculture in Balikesir, the agriculture-based industry has developed.

And if we come to the products that occupy an important place in the economy of Balik Asir, the most important of them are flour, olives, olive oil, canned goods and vegetable oil..
